symptoms: dyspnea with normal pulmonary function tests

diagnoses: Inflammatory bowel disease (Crohns disease or ulcerative colitis)
Leukemia or lymphoma with bone marrow involvement
info:Decreased immunoglobulins are a key finding that suggests an underlying immunodeficiency
which can cause increased susceptibility to infections like laryngitis. Some immunodeficiencies are associated with other symptoms like oral pain and chemical sensitivities.}
info:Some autoimmune diseases like Sjögrens syndrome or lupus can cause dry mouth leading to oral pain
and increased risk of laryngitis. Fatigue and decreased libido can also occur. Chemical sensitivities are reported in some cases.}
info:CFS is associated with immune dysfunction which may cause low immunoglobulins and viral reactivation leading to laryngitis. Decreased libido
chemical sensitivities and oral pain are also frequently reported symptoms.}
leading to low libido. Patients often report chemical sensitivities. Immune dysfunction may cause low immunoglobulins and viral reactivation with laryngitis. Oral pain occurs in some cases.}

info:Hypothyroidism commonly causes fatigue and low libido. It is linked to immune dysfunction which may lead to low immunoglobulins and recurrent infections like laryngitis. Some patients report oral symptoms and chemical sensitivities.}

info:Depression is a common cause of decreased libido. Depressed patients often have altered immune function which could cause low immunoglobulins and laryngitis. Oral pain and chemical sensitivities are reported in some cases of depression.}
and others can cause decreased libido as a side effect. Some may also cause dry mouth and oral pain
immune suppression with low immunoglobulins and laryngitis.}

info:Menopause causes hormonal changes that frequently lead to decreased libido. Oral discomfort and chemical sensitivities may occur. Immunoglobulin levels and susceptibility to infections like laryngitis can be affected by hormonal changes.}

info:Sleep apnea can cause chronic fatigue and decreased libido. Altered immune function may lead to low immunoglobulins and viral reactivation with laryngitis. Oral breathing may cause dry mouth and oral pain. Some patients report chemical sensitivities.}

info:Chronic sinus infections are linked to immune dysfunction and can cause decreased immunoglobulins. Post-nasal drip may cause laryngitis. Fatigue and low libido are common. Some patients develop oral pain and chemical sensitivities.}
